job description:
Des Moines, Iowa
Skills : Business Analyst,COM,Data Analysis, Excel
Description : Title: Data analyst
Duration: 03 months (Possibility of Extension)
Location: Des Moines, IA - 50309
  • Candidate to join a special project to provide business analyst level support
  • A variety of tasks to include data analysis, and reporting
  • Assist in the handling of exceptions, escalations, and complaint cases
  • Will not be customer facing but will handle back end support for inquiries that come in.
  • 80% of the role will be data analysis via Excel
Requirements:
  • Associates degree or equivalent education and experience, bachelors degree preferred
  • Ability to accomplish multiple tasks simultaneously in a fast-paced environment
  • Intermediate or higher MS Word, Excel, and PPT Skills
  • Strong communication skills, work ethic and high level of personal integrity and accountability
  • Data Analyst Experience will be criticalBusiness Analyst,COM,Data Analysis, Excel
